name: Watermelon Smoothie
description: This watermelon smoothie is perfect for hot summer days! It's refreshing, super easy to make, vegan, and so delicious. 5 minutes is all it takes!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups frozen watermelon, cut into cubes or small slices

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients in a blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend until smooth. Use the pulse function a couple of times. If you want a thinner smoothie, add more almond milk or a bit of water.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend until smooth. Use the pulse function a couple of times. If you want a thinner smoothie, add more almond milk or a bit of water.
